name: Ram
description: Reduces damage taken when colliding with another ship or mega creature.

name: Grappling Ram
description: Designed for grappling another ship during collision.

name: Grappler Arms
description: Allows the Helmsman to make bludgeoning attacks or attempt to grapple other ships.

name: Dragon Figurehead
description: Can breathe fire in a large cone ahead of the ship.

name: Couatl Figurehead
description: Can repair the ship using gathered magical energy.

name: Displacer Beast Figurehead
description: Creates magical illusions of the ship to grant disadvantage on attack rolls against it.
